REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1523 reute d f BC-RCM-TECHNOLOGIES-<RCM 03-26 0053

TEXT.TITLE: RCM TECHNOLOGIES <RCMT> ORDER INCREASED
TEXT.BODY: RCM Technologies Inc said its contract to provide engineering personnel to the Sikorsky Aircraft division of United Technologies Corp <UTX> has been increased by 4,300,000 dlrs to 11.0 mln dlrs. It said the contract runs through the end of 1987. Reuter
